title: Dot Hutchison - The Butterfly Garden
description:
Near an isolated mansion lies a beautiful garden.

In this garden grow luscious flowers, shady treesâ€¦and a collection of precious â€œbutterfliesâ€â€”young women who have been kidnapped and intricately tattooed to resemble their namesakes. Overseeing it all is the Gardener, a brutal, twisted man obsessed with capturing and preserving his lovely specimens.

When the garden is discovered, a survivor is brought in for questioning. FBI agents Victor Hanoverian and Brandon Eddison are tasked with piecing together one of the most stomach-churning cases of their careers. But the girl, known only as Maya, proves to be a puzzle herself.

As her story twists and turns, slowly shedding light on life in the Butterfly Garden, Maya reveals old grudges, new saviors, and horrific tales of a man whoâ€™d go to any length to hold beauty captive. But the more she shares, the more the agents have to wonder what sheâ€™s still hiding...
